title: File a Notice of Appearance
description: An attorney is taking over a case from a prior counsel and needs to file a notice of appearance with the court.

tasks.description: Draft the Notice of Appearance, including the case caption, the attorney's name, bar number, and contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares the correct legal document.

tasks.description: Electronically file the notice with the court through the CM/ECF system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The notice is successfully filed on the case docket.

tasks.description: Serve a copy of the filed notice on all other parties in the case.
tasks.expected_outcome: All parties are formally notified that the new attorney is now counsel of record.
